title: Complete application CICD based on Jenkins and Argocd
description: This experiment aims to demonstrate how to combine Jenkins and Argocd to deploy GitOps-based continuous deployment. The Helm Charts are moved to a new Gitlab repository named `argocd-charts` as new commit ids in the main codebase are created with each change, which is not conducive to maintaining the code repository. Charts are placed for the `go-hello-world` project in this repository, and a `go-hello-world/charts/dev.values.yaml` file is created with development application configurations. Using the original developed multi-branch version auto-publishing, a modification is implemented to develop a Jenkins pipeline. It is shown how to construct the development pipeline using Jenkins' shared Libraries, in combination with a `Jenkinsfile`.
